subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Bob Osborne, the crew chief for Carl Edwards, was punished by Nascar because a postrace inspection in Las Vegas discovered that the lid to an oil tank reservoir was dislodged in Edwards’s car.
snippet: Bob Osborne, the crew chief for Carl Edwards, was punished by Nascar because a postrace inspection in Las Vegas discovered that the lid to an oil tank reservoir was dislodged in Edwards’s car.
